This fare is currently unknown by the application.
This fare can still be used, but it is not possible to bought it anymore. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in this zone. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A and B. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B and C. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

This ticket is not valid on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.
This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nOnce used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A and B. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is valid for all the weekend (from Friday at 4 PM until Monday at 5 AM). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zones A, B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There is no constraints for transfers.
